Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli

Class Cli

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli.Cli
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Ui
    public class Cli
extends java.lang.Object
implements Ui
    This class manage Command Line Interface as User Interface.

      • showMessage

        public java.lang.String showMessage​(java.lang.String toBeShown,
                                    java.util.List<java.lang.String> possibleAnswers,
                                    boolean isAnswerRequired)
        Prints a message coming from server.
        Specified by:
        showMessage in interface Ui
        Parameters:
        toBeShown - is a string represent a question or a statement
        possibleAnswers - is the list of the possible answers that user can choose
        isAnswerRequired - specify if an answer is required (the message is a question) or is not (the message is a notice)
        Returns:
        the user's answer or a reception acknowledgement

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

      • askChoiceByNumber

        private int askChoiceByNumber​(int size)
        Catches the user answer and checks if it is valid, requesting it again until it is not a valid answer.
        Parameters:
        size - of the possible answer list
        Returns:
        the number typed by user
